website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS 90D offers a new sensor with significantly more resolution than its predecessor, but competing mirrorless cameras have an edge in autofocus performance.

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the addition of spot focus .
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Canon 90D primarily for wildlife photography for use with Canon 100-400mm EF L zoom lens. Already owning the 70D + 80D, I had no problem adjusting to the upgrades in the 90D. The spot focus is a great addition for use in precise focusing for wildlife shots and the additional pixels, now a 32.5Mp sensor, allow for grater cropping as can be the case especially when photographing small birds and mammals. I've never been disappointed with my previous Canons and this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Camera - happy with the upgrade form the Eos 7D MK II
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful, a big upgrade in most parts from my well used EOS 7D MKII - this picture quality is fantastic, as is the 4k video mode. The ability to send all files to the PC's over wi-fi is a great benefit. There are many pluses to owning this camera. The one downside is there is no GPS built-in which I find quite shocking in 2020 and on such a high tech camera. It was nearly a deal-breaker for me but I thought I could buy an add-on cheaply, but they are around £200 - £300 which is not good. Come on Canon, all DSLR's should have GPS built-in!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Procter

customer_reviews.title: Good for wildlife
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Been using almost a year now for wildlife photography. Great fps. Sharp photos, good range of options easy access to main controls. Used in rain no problems. Flip out screen handy. Never used flash. Battery lasts me two or three days for stills. Shorter for video. Auto focus good enough for shooting birds in flight. Stuck little wind muffs on mic opening. Phone app good for previewing or social media on the go. Turned off touch screen. Rather use physical buttons. Lost the view finder rubber surround twice, but mught just be me not taking care when removing rain cover.
customer_reviews.author: Gav

customer_reviews.title: Canon 90D best of all worlds.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't decide between the Canon 5D or the 7D then Canon launched the 90D. The 90D covered everything I wanted from a camera and I haven't been disappointed. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great camera better than my 5d mk 2.
customer_reviews.text: As an intermediary camera this is very good I use it for wild life and macro photography and are pleased with the results. It great that it can take my ef lenses as well as the ef-s lenses. I keep my full frame for landscape mainly and the crop sensor for my macro. Good piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: dexter luminol

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement over 80d
customer_reviews.text: Works very well huge improvement over the 80D it's well worth the price. Comfy to hold although markedly heavier then 80d it's well balanced
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic DSLR! Kudos to the amazon seller too!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Its fast and pretty easy to use if you take the time to learn about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse Item -  Apparently "Only A Damaged Box" ??
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm...beware of warehouse items. This was supposed to have only a damaged box. The item failed to switch on properly and on close inspection there were slight signs it had been opened and then I noticed the smears on the camera mirror as the photo shows. Update. It also took nearly 3 weeks to get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mole ; Andrew Mole

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best cameras that you are going to buy. It will take an age to learn all of the menus that it holds but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Steven J. Corbett

customer_reviews.title: It is my amazing new companion
customer_reviews.text: I have only had my Canon 90D a few days, I am absolutely loving it so far. Lots to learn, the touch screen is brilliant. Rather heavy carrying on a 4 hour walk compared to a phone.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Light, user friendly and good quality DSLR.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this a couple of weeks now. It’s lighter than I thought it would be which is great. It was my upgrade from a basic DSLR. Still experimenting with it but I’m pleased with the various settings/functions so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elicatdun

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Recieved as ordered. Very positive experience! Would highly recommend. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: david morgan

customer_reviews.title: Glad I upgraded
customer_reviews.text: Would probably have been better to have been fitted with dual memory card slots.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera not to heavy and good results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Video features not good
customer_reviews.text: Picture photography is good. Size and weight are bulky Max video recording time is 29 minutes (and no way to change this configuration), we need to stich multiple videos together after recording. we cannot take pictures while recording a video we cannot pause recording a video , we can merely stop recording it . With this limitation how can we record long running events like interviews / games . This feature is available even in a basic smart phone camera. Think twice if you want to buy this camera if recording good videos is one of your motive
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Rafeeq

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had it but I'm sure it's a really good camera!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't mind having it, by the looks it seems really cool and probably does the job perfectly as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Esther S

product_meta.title: Canon EOS 90D Body Only,Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Body OnlyThe EOS 90D is a DSLR with a 32.5 megapixel APS-C sensor that delivers superb image quality and extends the effective reach of telephoto lenses. Add in 45-point AF points, 10fps shooting and a multi-control dial and you have a powerful cam-era for wildlife and sports photography.
feature_bullets: From wildlife hide to trackside - Keep up with the action, shooting at 10fps with Intelligent Tracking and Recognition (iTR) focus tracking when using the optical viewfinder and 11fps in Live View mode.
See every drop of detail - A 32.5 megapixel sensor works with a DIGIC 8 processor to deliver superb image quality – even in low light, with up to ISO 25,600 sensitivity.
Intuitive DSLR design - An intelligent optical viewfinder delivers a clear bright view that’s comfortable to use for long periods. The EOS 90D feels balanced even with long telephoto lenses.
An intelligent performance - A 220,000 pixel RGB+IR metering sensor works with the camera’s iTR focusing system for superb subject tracking – following faces and other objects around the frame.
Superb creative video - Shoot stunning 4K video, using Dual Pixel CMOS AF to keep things sharp and cinematic. Capture great audio and use frame rates up to 120fps for slow motion filming.
Face detection (Optical Viewfinder & Live View). Eye Detection AutoFocus (One-Shot & Servo AutoFocus – Live View)

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
